name: Cave of Jagnog
description: Your name is Andrew. You are now standing in line for a job interview to be a construction worker. Whilst walking to the manager, a table from the story above you accidentally slides out through a big open hole in the (still under construction) wall, and falls right on your head. You fall, fall, fall, into a hole and deep underground. A few hours later you wake up, in a different place as before. You now have to fend for yourself and find a way out of that cave.
